channel.title: apply domain on Orange
channel.description: Recent content in apply domain on Orange

item.title: Why You Should Use Apply Domain
item.description: It can happen you’d see a widget in Orange and think: “What on Earth does this even do?” We admit, finding informative widget names is not always easy and Apply Domain had a least 5 different names so far. While it might not be clear what the widget does from its name, the actual functionality is one of the nicer ones Orange has to offer. Say you are transforming your data with PCA.
